title: Peter Punch Party
summary: A punching game for your Android Wear
description: My name is Peter Pickle.I am a poor, petty programmer.I have made this game about punching so that I can eat pickles.You can use your finger to punch, but it supports Android Wear so you can get some exercise (I need the exercise too).Please help me buy pickles.Welcome to my Punch Party!HOW TO PLAYPunch what you must, but don't punch dog because it is illegal!FEATURESPunchingLeaderboardCalorie Counter on Android Wear (do not sue me if not accurate)Awesome graphics I created on a Samsung Galaxy Note
descriptionHTML:
My name is Peter Pickle.


I am a poor, petty programmer.


I have made this game about punching so that I can eat pickles.


You can use your finger to punch, but it supports Android Wear so you can get some exercise (I need the exercise too).


Please help me buy pickles.


Welcome to my Punch Party!


HOW TO PLAY
Punch what you must, but don't punch dog because it is illegal!


FEATURES
  • Punching

  • Leaderboard

  • Calorie Counter on Android Wear (do not sue me if not accurate)

  • Awesome graphics I created on a Samsung Galaxy Note
comments: Great game You do exactly what the games says. That dog is killing me though!
It works! Simple but very addictive apps, specially when connected with android wear. Running well with LG G Pro 2 + moto 360
I Love 2 punch pester! But not dog.
Fun Good short game, makes me want an android watch.
It's party time... I am a professional heavy weight boxer and this is by far the most accurate depiction of what I do for a living: punching fat people. Would punch again. 5 stars
I like this game pretty decently.
recentChanges: I want to taste pickle in my mouth, so I make game better. Here is what I do:
* tuned difficulty so it is easier
* dog pops up twice as slow, so it is easier
* fixed crash because I am powerful programmer
Please support game so I may put pickle in my mouth.
